channel.title: Review on Kenny Nguyen (momo)
channel.description: Recent content in Review on Kenny Nguyen (momo)

item.title: Review of Mobile App Pentesting Certifications
item.description: Review of Mobile App Pentest Certifications State of Mobile App Certs and My Journey The landscape of mobile app penetration testing certifications has been evolving rapidly. However, as a beginner to mobile app penetration testing, there isn’t as many resources compared to other domains of offensive security. At the moment, mobile app pentesting is still a niche domain in offsec and is not talked about much. Recently, I began getting into mobile app pentesting.

item.title: Certified Red Team Operator (CRTO) Review
item.description: What is CRTO? CRTO is supposed to be an introductory course into red teaming tradecraft, from initial compromise all the way to domain takeover and data exfiltration. From their website: “Red Team Ops is an online course that teaches the basic principals, tools and techniques, that are synonymous with red teaming. Students will first cover the core concepts of adversary simulation, command & control, and how to plan for an engagement.
